summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 56, Terry's 1st Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley between 7th Avenue and 8th Avenue, extending from Cherry Street to Columbia Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6627, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
